column4: how well will ubuntu pick up and initialize (partition/etc) a new hard drive that may or may not have been in my xbox previously but windows sees and wont let me use? o.O
linux does not use the bios to find and access hdd's so probably "very well"

if you can not partition the drive from the installer you probably cant use it.    and if m$ can see the drive but cant access it     that means that it is probably a hardware issue.  i.e.  remove it, you cant use it.
hehhe or unplug the ide cable and flip it over the right way......  :?
